keys.string: I don’t know who to pick to be my mentor.
Well is there any particular professor you enjoy? Personality or class-wise?
There’s not really a wrong choice here. Whoever you pick, you’ll still do fine in school.
Seth’s words give me hope and fill me with determination.

ArrayOfString.string: [Player][Dialog]I don’t know who to pick to be my mentor.
[Seth][Dialog]Well is there any particular professor you enjoy? Personality or class-wise?
[Seth][Dialog]There’s not really a wrong choice here. Whoever you pick, you’ll still do fine in school.
[Narrator][Dialog]Seth’s words give me hope and fill me with determination.
